languages.text: Грубоватый смех капитана доносится из вокс-системы. Флогистон используется в самых различных аспектах жизни имперцев, и ему нет дела, как именно его заказчики собираются его использовать. Паломник обещает лишь одно — флогистон послужит на благо Человечества.

traits.locale_text: Грубоватый смех капитана доносится из вокс-ситемы. Силовые кристаллы используются в самых различных аспектах жизни имперцев, и ему нет дела, как именно его заказчики собираются их использовать. Паломник обещает лишь одно — кристаллы послужат на благо Человечества.

languages.text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.
languages.original_text: Грубоватый смех капитана доносится из вокс-системы. Флогистон используется в самых различных аспектах жизни имперцев, и ему нет дела, как именно его заказчики собираются его использовать. Паломник обещает лишь одно — флогистон послужит на благо Человечества.

traits.locale_text: The captain's coarse laughter comes from the vox. Power crystals are part and parcel of many different aspects of Imperial life. How exactly his customers are going to use them is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the crystals will be used for the good of Humanity.

The captain's coarse laughter comes from the vox. Power crystals are part and parcel of many different aspects of Imperial life. How exactly his customers are going to use them is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the crystals will be used for the good of Humanity.

The captain's coarse laughter echos forth from the vox. Power crystals are part and parcel of many different aspects of Imperial life. How exactly his customers are going to use them is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the crystals will be used for the good of Humanity.

The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of Imperial life. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Power crystals are part and parcel of many different aspects of Imperial life. How exactly his customers are going to use them is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the crystals will be used for the good of Humanity.

The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

languages.text: 音阵系统中传来了舰长粗犷的笑声。燃素在帝国生活方方面面都会派上用场，至于他的客户究竟会如何使用这些燃素，这不是他该关心的事情。不过，朝圣者承诺道，这些燃素将会用来实现人类的利益。
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 音阵系统中传来了舰长粗犷的笑声。燃素在帝国生活方方面面都会派上用场，至于他的客户究竟会如何使用这些燃素，这不是他该关心的事情。不过，朝圣者承诺道，这些燃素将会用来实现人类的利益。

languages.text: La risa del capitán resuena por el voco. El flogisto es una parte esencial de numerosos aspectos de la vida diaria en el Imperium, y la forma exacta en la que sus clientes vayan a usarlo no le importa en absoluto. El Peregrino solo puede prometerte que el flogisto se usará para el bien de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: La risa del capitán resuena por el voco. Los cristales de energía son una parte esencial de la vida diaria en el Imperium, y la forma exacta en la que sus clientes vayan a usarlos no le importa en absoluto. El Peregrino solo puede prometerte que los cristales se usarán para el bien de la Humanidad.

languages.text: Das raue Lachen des Captains hallt aus dem Vox wider. Flogiston ist für viele Aspekte des imperialen Lebens unverzichtbar. Wie genaue seine Kunden es einsetzen, ist nicht sein Problem. Der Pilger verspricht nur, dass das Flogiston zum Wohle der Menschheit eingesetzt wird.
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Das raue Lachen des Captains hallt aus dem Vox wider. Flogiston ist für viele Aspekte des imperialen Lebens unverzichtbar. Wie genaue seine Kunden es einsetzen, ist nicht sein Problem. Der Pilger verspricht nur, dass das Flogiston zum Wohle der Menschheit eingesetzt wird.

Das raue Lachen des Captains hallt aus dem Vox. Flogiston ist für viele verschiedene Aspekte des imperialen Lebens unverzichtbar. Wie genau seine Kunden es einsetzen, ist nicht sein Problem. Der Pilger verspricht lediglich, dass das Flogiston zum Wohle der Menschheit eingesetzt wird.

languages.text: Le rire bourru du capitaine résonne à travers le vox. Le flogiston fait partie intégrante de nombreux aspects de la vie impériale. L'usage précis qu'en feront ses clients ne le regarde en rien. Tout ce que peut dire le Pèlerin, c'est que ce flogiston sera utilisé pour le bien de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Le rire bourru du capitaine résonne à travers le vox. Les cristaux de pouvoir font partie intégrante de nombreux aspects de la vie impériale. L'usage précis qu'en feront ses clients n'est pas son problème. Tout ce que peut dire le Pèlerin, c'est que ces cristaux seront utilisés pour le bien de l'humanité.

languages.text: 船長のザラついた笑い声がヴォクスから響く。フロギストンは、帝国の様々な場面で使われている。顧客がフロギストンをどう使おうと関係ない。巡礼者が言えるのは、フロギストンが人類のために使われるということだけだ。
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 船長のザラついた笑い声がヴォクスから響く。フロギストンは、帝国の様々な場面で使われている。顧客がフロギストンをどう使おうと関係ない。巡礼者が言えるのは、フロギストンが人類のために使われるということだけだ。

languages.text: Kaptanın kaba kahkahası vokstan yankılanıyor. Flogiston, İmparatorluk'taki birçok farklı yaşam alanının ayrılmaz bir parçasıymış. Kendisi, müşterilerinin bunu ne amaçla kullandığına bakmasa da flogistonun İnsanlığın iyiliği için kullanılacağına söz veriyor.
languages.original_text: The captain's coarse laughter echoes forth from the vox. Flogiston is a part and parcel of many different aspects of life in the Imperium. How exactly his customers are going to use it is none of his concern. All that the Pilgrim promises is that the flogiston will be used for the good of Humanity.
